name: Castlepoint
description:
Are you looking for new base strategy games in which you need to defend your base and attack enemy areas? Or a classic board strategy with 1v1 action-strategy battles and a time limit?

Introducing Castlepoint, an immersive fantasy & medieval strategy game similar to chess and old-style action-based real time strategy games. Conquer enemy areas, without allowing them to enter yours!

🆚PLAY 1VS1
Enjoy this rts game offline in a 1vs1 game against AI opponent. Our quick strategy game soon will also feature multiplayer with 1vs1 and 2vs2 game modes.

⚔️DIFFERENT DIFFICULTY LEVELS AND ERAS
Start this medieval rts game offline and choose from a variety of difficulty levels for a single player. Our medieval rts has 15 hero characters to choose from. Each of them has different stats and skills.

ℹ️HOW TO PLAY
This chess strategy inspired rts game is extremely easy to play. All you need is to:
- pick an era
- choose heroes to spawn
- get 5 heroes to the enemy area with great strategy
- defend the base and prevent 5 enemy heroes from getting into your area

🏯CASTLEPOINT FEATURES:
● 1vs1 game mode (2vs2 and multiplayer modes will soon be announced)
● our defense strategy game has 15 heroes to choose from
● each hero in the combat strategy has different stats and skills
● there is a time limit for added competitiveness
● play in different eras
● choose from different difficulty levels
● medieval inspired soundtrack and graphics
● play this action rts offline

Now it’s time to immerse yourself in the world of Castlepoint.
